code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../AuthContext';import logo from'../assets/logo.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=_ref=>{let{isScrolled}=_ref;const{isLoggedIn,logout}=useAuth();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[isScrolled&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Logo",className:"navbar-logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/about",children:"About"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/images",children:"Images"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contact",children:"Contact"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-right",children:isLoggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"login-btn",onClick:logout,children:"Logout"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"login-btn",children:"Login"})})})]});};export default Navbar;
